rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Resource
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class resource, everything.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Literal
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of literal values, eg. textual strings and integers.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Class
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of classes.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Datatype
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of RDF datatypes.

rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: string
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: The datatype of RDF literals storing strings

rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: datetime
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: The datatype of RDF literals storing datetimes

rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: integer
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: The datatype of RDF literals storing integers

rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: float
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: The datatype of RDF literals storing floats

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: value
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: Idiomatic property used for structured values.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: label
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A human-readable name for the subject.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: CRM Entity
CRM Entität
Entité CRM
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises all things in the universe of discourse of the CIDOC Conceptual Reference Model.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Entité temporelle
Temporal Entity
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises all phenomena, ...

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Spacetime Volume
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises 4 dimensional point sets (volumes) in physical spacetime regardless its true geometric form. They may derive their identity from being ...

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Phase
Period
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises sets of coherent phenomena or cultural manifestations occurring in time and space.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Event
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises changes of states in cultural, social or physical systems,

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Разрушение
Destruction
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises events that destroy one or more instances of E18 Physical Thing such that they lose their identity as the subjects of documentation.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Activity
Activité
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises actions intentionally carried out by instances of E39 Actor that result in changes of state in the cultural, social, or physical systems documented.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Destruction Activity
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A pseudo class to be used for Destructions that are carried out by actors, and serialized as both E6 and E7 on the way out of Arches.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Persistent Item
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises items that have a persistent identity, sometimes known as “endurants” in philosophy.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Chose
Thing
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This general class comprises discrete, identifiable, instances

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Künstliches
Man-Made Thing
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises discrete, identifiable man-made items

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Objet juridique
Legal Object
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises those material or immaterial items to which instances of E30 Right, such as the right of ownership or use, can be applied.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Materielles
Physical Thing
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises all persistent physical items with a relatively stable form, man-made or natural.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Objet conceptuel
Conceptual Object
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises non-material products of our minds and other human produced data that...

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Aussagenobjekt
Propositional Object
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises immaterial items, ...

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Symbolisches Objekt
Symbolic Object
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises identifiable symbols and any aggregation of symbols, ...

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: consists of
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of E4 Period with another instance of E4 Period

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: falls within
fällt in
está contido em
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of E92 Spacetime Volume

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: zerstörte
a détruit
destroyed
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property allows specific instances of E18 Physical Thing that have been destroyed to be related to a destruction event.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: was influenced by
foi influenciado por
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is a high level property, which captures the relationship between an E7 Activity and anything that may have had some bearing upon it.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is composed of
est composé de
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of E90 Symbolic Object with a part of it

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Durée
Time-Span
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises abstract temporal extents, in the sense of Galilean physics, having a beginning, an end and a duration.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: ongoing throughout
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property describes the minimum period of time covered by an E52 Time-Span.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: couvre au plus
at some time within
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property describes the maximum period of time within which an E52 Time-Span falls.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: a pour durée
has time-span
hat Zeitspanne
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property describes the temporal confinement of an instance of an E2 Temporal Entity.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: end of the begin
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is defined as the first boundary of the property P81

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: begin of the end
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is defined as the second boundary of the property P81

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: begin of the begin
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is defined as the first boundary of the property P82

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: end of the end
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This is defined as the second boundary of the property P82
